Dating: PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD; ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Technique: BURNED, OXIDIZED; ENGRAVED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Terracotta of a lion
Description: Terracotta of a sitting lion showing the head and part of the body. There are remnants of yellow paint in the neck and on the face, and of pink paint on the inside of the ears.
